name: Peter & The Trip Demo
description:
When Peter discovers an atemporal location outside of space and reason seemingly made specifically for him, he soon learns that that deep below the surface, his id, the source of his desires, lusts and grudges dwells. Commanding an array of creatures to stop him from reaching the root of human evil, The id defends itself surrounded by physcoscapes and geometry that is at times ethereal and beautiful, but often hostile and hellish beyond your own imagination. Peter's goal becomes cemented into his will to live in this new environment: Reach The id, and murder it.

Use BLEND to become temporarily invisible to enemies and security!

Use MOVE to throw objects as weapons!

Use SHOCK to duplicate objects and disable machines!

Use HYPNO to change items into something else!

Use MORPH to turn dead insects into friends!

All music from the albums SILENCE II and I can't wait to be sad and alone at the edge of the universe by Halley Labs, used with permission.
